en.title: Software Development Engineer
list: Contributed on an algorithm based software for trading, making easier for traders to trade by giving helpful insights and reports
Developed a software using Firebase where users can create teams, invite people and collaboratecollectively and efficiently
{{Integrated}} : Firestore Database, Firestore security Rules , Lazy Loading , Real Time Work with Data API

es.title: Desarrollador {{Backend}}
es.text: Desarrollé y mantuve [[sistemas backend escalables]] para varios clientes, optimizando el rendimiento de bases de datos e implementando APIs RESTful para mejorar la funcionalidad de las aplicaciones.

fr.title: Développeur {{Backend}}
fr.text: Développement et maintenance de [[systèmes backend évolutifs]] pour divers clients, optimisation des performances des bases de données et mise en place d’API RESTful pour améliorer les fonctionnalités des applications.

ko.title: {{백엔드}} 개발자
ko.text: 다양한 클라이언트를 위한 [[확장 가능한 백엔드 시스템]]을 개발하고 유지보수했으며, 데이터베이스 성능을 최적화하고 RESTful API를 구현하여 애플리케이션 기능을 향상시켰습니다.

en.title: Full Stack Developer
list: Developed a platform where clients and bidders can post and get work with chat support, payment gateway support and join communities
Integrate AI in a website, where an end user can generate a whole working website using one click.
Single handedly developed a project management software where IT companies can easily manage, assign and achieve their task efficiently
{{Integrated}} : Stripe Payment Gateway, Google Map Integration , Push And Email Notification , Cloud Functions , Chatgpt Integration , Aws Bucket , Firebase Security Rules

es.title: Ingeniero {{Full-Stack}}
es.text: Trabajé en la mejora del sitio web de Coursera implementando nuevas funciones y optimizando la experiencia del usuario, utilizando tecnologías tanto de frontend como de backend para garantizar una funcionalidad fluida.

fr.title: Ingénieur {{Full-Stack}}
fr.text: Participation à l'amélioration du site web de Coursera en développant de nouvelles fonctionnalités et en optimisant l’expérience utilisateur, en utilisant des technologies frontend et backend pour assurer un fonctionnement fluide.

ko.title: {{풀스택}} 엔지니어
ko.text: Coursera 웹사이트의 기능을 향상시키기 위해 새로운 기능을 구현하고 사용자 경험을 개선하는 작업을 수행했으며, 프론트엔드와 백엔드 기술을 모두 활용하여 원활한 동작을 보장했습니다.

en.title: Full Stack Developer
list: Single handedly developed fully dynamic admin panel and backend for a dating app. Optimized search using indexing, pagination etc and decreasing the time from 15 seconds to 2 seconds.
Managed admin panel and backend of an expenser manager, where users can view analytics and manage transfers, expenses by categories, wallet etc.
{{Implemented}}: Implemented real-time communication with WebSocket, live streaming, REST APIs, SQL,Firebase notifications, AWS, video streaming with M3U8, and MongoDB.

es.title: Ingeniero {{Backend}}
es.text: Contribuí al desarrollo de sistemas backend robustos para Adobe Creative Cloud, integrando servicios de terceros y mejorando la eficiencia del procesamiento de datos mediante funciones en la nube.

fr.title: Ingénieur {{Backend}}
fr.text: Participation au développement de systèmes backend robustes pour Adobe Creative Cloud, intégration de services tiers et amélioration de l’efficacité du traitement des données via des fonctions cloud.

ko.title: {{백엔드}} 엔지니어
ko.text: Adobe Creative Cloud를 위한 견고한 백엔드 시스템 개발에 기여하였으며, 서드파티 서비스 통합 및 클라우드 기능을 활용한 데이터 처리 효율 향상에 집중했습니다.
